Title: A Streetcar Named Desire
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Beau DeMayo, Diane Ademu-John, Declan De Barra (executive story editor), Ashley Lyle (executive story editor), Bart Nickerson (executive story editor), Michael Russo (executive story editor), Carina Adly MacKenzie (story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: The unexpected arrival of Stefan Salvatore may be the key to helping Freya rescue Klaus and Elijah from a magical trap.
